snippet: Stimulant medications prescribed for children with A.D.H.D. are being abused by high school students wanting to study late into the night and stay focused during exams.
lead_paragraph: Stimulant medications prescribed for children with A.D.H.D. are being abused by high school students wanting to study late into the night and stay focused during exams.

headline.seo: ‘Study Drugs’ Popular Among High School Students
headline.main: ‘Study Drugs’ Popular Among High School Students
